TFRooney wrote:

> Thanks, I can see how that would work.  I'm still curious as to how to
> replace the TestResult with a subclassed version.  It seems that
> TestRunner has TestResult hardcoded as the default.  Is there a way to
> pass in a replacement?

Somewhere in the framework is the method createTestResult(). If you 
subclassed that class and overrode that method, that might be enough. 
Everything else seems to take TestResult as a parameter.
